actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to insure proper recognition of professional nurses, to fulfill the intent of Congress in the enactment of Public Law 93-380 relating to the supervisory status of professional nurses, and to end the ongoing disruption of established bargaining units of professional nurses.

summary.text: Professional Nurse Employee Rights Act - Stipulates that professional nurses shall be considered "supervisors" under the National Labor Relations Act only if they exercise the preponderance of specified hiring, work assignment, and grievance adjustment authority.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to insure proper recognition of professional nurses, to fulfill the intent of Congress in the enactment of Public Law 93-380 relating to the supervisory status of professional nurses, and to end the ongoing disruption of established bargaining units of professional nurses.
